tag_list: marketing, agency, technology, start-ups, branding, creative, b2b, pr, software, it
overview:
Annie Eissler is co-founder and VP of Client Services at Mixtur, the Seattle-based agency for technology offering marketing, branding and creative services to technology start-ups and companies in transition.

Annie leads Mixtur’s client services division, which includes marketing services, project management, and new business development. Mixtur’s clients include: doxo, Datacastle, ReadySetAuction, 3R Technology, SMB Nation, Paladin Data Systems, Bandwidth Advisors, Westbury, Applied Technical Systems, SpringCM, ServerVault, Neutral Net.

Annie has extensive experience designing and executing market penetration, revenue generation, branding and PR strategies for technology products, services and companies in the B2B, B2G and B2C space in the U.S., Canada, and Europe. Over the past twenty years, she has led marketing operations for Internet, telecommunications, software, Web-based services, and IT firms ranging from publicly traded companies to venture-backed start-ups. She has held positions from product manager to director of e-business and vice president of marketing at such companies as PSINet, Synchris, COMTek, and ARC.
